events.name: Reactive Programming Coursera - Week 3
events.description: Let's meetup again and have a bit of fun coding the assignments together. The first week was great, I for one was definitely able to learn faster with a bit of help and discussion from everyone. I'm away in Korea this weekend so the next meetup will be for week 3 for the course. (I've chosen Wednesday as that some people might be traveling for the long weekend.) So if you're doing the course and want to discuss the concepts, or got stuck on some syntax/integration issue or just want some motivation and dedicated Scala time come down and join us! https://class.coursera.org/reactive-002
events.location: Lowercase, 1 McNally St, Blk D #01-01, Singapore

events.name: EdTech Meetup #1 - EdTech Ecosystem Panel & Video for Better Edu. Outcomes
events.description:
Come join and network with the local EdTech community for EdTech Asiaâ€™s innaugural and free event. The evening will feature a 20 minute presentation titled Leveraging VIdeo for Better Educational Outcomes followed by a 40 minute panel discussion on Local and Regional EdTech Ecosystems: Challenges and Opportunities. Ample time for networking will be provided. 
Panelists: 
Elisha Tan is an Ecosystem Builder at Tech in Asia. She helps build startup ecosystems in Asia by providing the right resources and opportunities to founders, investors, accelerators and incubators. Prior to working at TIA, Elisha foudned Learnemy, an online marketplace where you can take in-person classes from local experts in Singapore.  Adrian Lim is the Deputy Director at IDA of Singapore where he leads a dynamic team to look at how we can work with the Education Technology industries to develop innovative and new ideas and applications in schools to enhance learning and teaching in the 21st century. Leslie Loh is active in the education startup investment space within the Asian region. He is also the founder of Tien Academy, a blended MOOC model to deliver entrepreneurship training in Singapore and across the region and acting Chairman of Lithan Education, a cooperative education provider for professional communities in Asia through competency based education and work integrated experiential learning.
events.location: Red Dot Ventures Incubation Office, , Block 79 Ayer Rajar Crescent, #04 - 03-04, Singapore 579723
